      • intensity

        public static int intensity(Emotion.EmotionType ety,
                            Rules.AppraisalRules appraisal,
                            Rules.EmotionIntensityThresholdRule threshold,
                            BeliefBase.Goals_Status goalsStatus,
                            Event e,
                            java.lang.String targetName)
        Intensity function, for determining the initial intensity of an emotion towards a given target, when this emotion is triggered for the first time. The trigger is an event.

      • potential

        public static int potential(Emotion.EmotionType ety,
                            Rules.AppraisalRules appraisal,
                            BeliefBase.Goals_Status goalsStatus,
                            Event e,
                            java.lang.String targetName)
        Potential function is used to determine the raw initial intensity of emotion towards a given goal, when it is triggered by an event. This is used inside the intensity-function.
